display_long_description:
**Train with a real AI coach who knows your goals, limits, and what you need today.**

Whether it’s strength, endurance, flexibility, or mental calm - TRAINR: MOVE meets you with 100+ expert-designed sessions. Your AI trainer doesn’t just guide you; they really understand you.

[media]

**Your AI trainer gets you - literally.**

Talk to them like a real coach. Change their personality. Share your goals. Adjust your plan on the fly. This is the world’s only life-sized, **conversational AI** fitness partner in VR - fully customizable, always adapting and fun, built to keep you coming back for more!


**Endless variety, zero boredom**

Unlock a new content pack every month, including the Kpop Pack, 1-on-1 Combat Pack,  Tropical Beach Pack, Farm Fitness, Wellness Pack, and so much more. 

Content packs are filled to the brim with all-new music, new trainers & customizations, new programs, new environments, and even all-new fun game modes! 

[media]
With 1,500+ trainer customization options and stunning Unreal-Engine powered worlds, or in **MIXED REALITY**, your workout never looks or feels the same twice.


**Track, grow, transform**

Follow pro-level programs, crush challenges, or let your life-sized AI-coach build your perfect session. See real progress with smart dashboards; or train together with friends via multiplayer and live leaderboards.

Subscribe today. Move with purpose. Feel the difference.
